column4: if i use fs-driver for ext3 support in xp, would it be possible (and advisable) to share a swap partition between xp and ubuntu?
I just have a fat32 partition to share between the two
what cdo you think of sharing?
Here's my setup. [ 10 Gb | NTFS | Windows ]  [ 10 GB | ext3 | Linux ]  [ 256 MB | swap ]  [ 60 GB | fat32 | my share drive :3 ]
